data.title: Aggressive Early A Main Control Barrier
data.description: Use this simple, but effective Barrier Mesh line up to disrupt Attackers looking to take A Main control at the start of the round. You can also place the barrier down to grab, and farm the free orb.

data.title: Aggressive Link to Mid Window Annihilation
data.description: Contest Mid with your teammates with this Annihilation line up off their contact / sound towards Window.
